March 4, 1958
Mr. Ronald J. McBeath
716 1/4 West 30th Street
Los Angeles 7, California
Dear Mr. McBeath:
Thank you for your letter of February 26 regarding our Fact Sheets. You are correct
in assuming that authors, reviewers, researchers, and so on work in conjunction
with each other and therefore although we have listed five men as having contributed
to Series HI, Article I, their work was on one article and not on a series of articles.
I am returning your check, along with a new up-to-date index. You will note that
there have been additions to Series I and II (and others) and that we have added an
entirely new Series — number VII.
For $7.50 we will send you aU of Series I, II, HI, IV, V, VI and VII and for an
additional $4.00 your name will be added to our mailing list to receive all Fact Sheets
distributed this year and the Journal (see enclosed mimeographed letter.) If you
still desire only those which you listed in your letter, the price is only $5.90 — not
the $6.30 you anticipated. If you do. purchase other material, you could send us
back the same check and just make up the difference with another check, saving you
the trouble of trying to get a refund on a money order.
I am also sending with this letter a listing of all mateials we have available. Per¬
haps you might find something of interest listed in this booklet and desire to purchase
I hope this letter has been of help to you and didn't confuse you too much. If there
is anything I can do for you, please let me know. Your order will be filled immedi¬
ately upon arrival.
Sincerely,
Enclosures (5)
(Mrs.)Judith B. Gans
Secretary
